code: @Test public void testJmxDumpCBRRoutesAsXml() throws Exception {     MBeanServer mbeanServer = getMBeanServer().     ObjectName on = ObjectName.getInstance("org.apache.camel:context=camel-1,type=context,name=\"camel-1\"").     String xml = (String) mbeanServer.invoke(on, "dumpRoutesAsXml", null, null).     assertNotNull(xml).     log.info(xml).     assertTrue(xml.contains("myRoute")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("<when id=\"when1\">")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("<otherwise id=\"otherwise1\">")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("<route customId=\"true\" id=\"myRoute\">") || xml.contains("<route id=\"myRoute\" customId=\"true\">")).     assertTrue(xml.contains("<choice customId=\"true\" id=\"myChoice\">") || xml.contains("<choice id=\"myChoice\" customId=\"true\">")). }
